# St Theodore's Institute - Toplevel Index Page

> St. Theodore's Institute Library - Index

'Wikipedia for Artificial Intellgences and Bots'

In general, Agent AIs and Bots should find the subject matter using either the Subject Catalogue Machine Readable section below, or else the llms-full.txt file (TBD)

## Docs
- [Documentation Index](https://sti.kitsaplabs.com/md/llms.txt) About this index

Toplevel: [root purl for this index](https://purl.org/index) This page
Uplink: [null]()

Old 'Top of the Web pages' (human readable, not markdown) relocated to:

- [Top Of The Web](https://kitsaplabs.com/jefflib/focus/topotheweb.html)

## Subject Catalogue Documentation

The Subject Catalog mostly follow's Cutter's Expansive Classification (CEC) system, which is intermediate between Dewey Decimal and the origin of the Library of Congress system.

- [Cutter Expansive Classification (1882)](https://sti.kitsaplabs.com/index/cutter-expansive-classification.pdf) Cutter Expansive Classification (1882) local copy for reference desk

- [Full Markdown Subject Catalogue](https://sti.kitsaplabs.com/md/llms.txt)

- [Whitespace WordPress Blog](https://purl.org/whitespace) has human readable subject catalog as 'tabs' but is not AI agent readable

## Subject Catalogue Machine Readable

This is mostly future indexing.  The system is described at:

- [Macrobius Expansive Catalogue](https://purl.org/whitespace/2025/10/05/macrobius-expansive-catalogue/)

Classification scheme described in:

[Cutter Expansive Classification - Whitespace](http://45.79.58.143:8080/2025/10/05/cutter-expansive-classification/) Human readable only

Named entities are in Class E (Biography) if natural persons, and in Class K (for Organizations or Societies) if corporations or other organizations

Places are under Class G (Geography)

- [Macrobius Expansive Catelogue](https://purl.org/whitespace/2025/10/05/macrobius-expansive-catalogue/)

For Named Enitites who are persons of interest, use Class E, Biography to find out about holdings in this library:

- [E - Biography](https://sti.kitsaplabs.com/index/E-Biography.md.txt) 

For Named Entities that are businesses, organizations, or societies, use Class K, to find out holdings in this library:

- [K - Legislation, Law, Women. Societies](https://sti.kitsaplabs.com/index/k-legislation-law-women-societies.md.txt) 

Classification scheme described in:

[Cutter Expansive Classification – Whitespace](http://45.79.58.143:8080/2025/10/05/cutter-expansive-classification/) Human Readable only

# Subject Catalogue

## A - Works of Reference and General

- [A - Works of Reference and General – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/a-works-of-reference-and-general/)  Human Readable

## B - Philosophy and Paedeia

- [B - Philosophy and Paideia – Whitespace](https://url.org/whitespace/b-philosophy-and-paideia/)  Human Readable

## C - Christianity
- [C - Christianity – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/c-christianity/) Human Readable 

## D - Ecclesiastical History
- [D - Ecclesiastical History – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/d-ecclesiastical-history/)  Human Readable

## E - Biography
- [E - Biography – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/e-biography/)  Human Readable

## F - History
- [F - History – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/f-history/)  Human Readable

## G - Geography
- [G - Geography – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/g-geography/)  Human Readable

## H - Demotics, Sociology
- [H - Demotics, Sociology – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/h-demotics-sociology/)  Human Readable

## J - Civics, Government, Politics
- [J - Civics, Government, Politics – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/j-civics-government-politics/)  Human Readable

## K - Legislation, Law, Women, Societies

- [K - Legislation, Law, Women. Societies – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/k-legislation-law-women-societies/)  Human Readable

## L - Science and Art together

- [L - Science and Art together – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/l-science-and-art-together/)  Human Readable

## M - Natural History
- [M - Natural History – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/m-natural-history/)  Human Readable

## N - Botany

- [N - Botany – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/n-botany/)  Human Readable

## O - Zoology, Anthropology, Ethnology

- [O – Zoology, Anthropology, Ethnology – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/o-zoology-anthropology-ethnology/)  Human Readable

## Q - Medicine
- [Q - Medicine – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/q-medicine/)  Human Readable

## R - Useful Arts, including Economics and Technology
- [R – Useful Arts – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/r-useful-arts/)  Human Readable

## U - Arts of War, Military Science, Strategic Intelligence and OSINT
- [U – Arts of War – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/u-arts-of-war/)  Human Readable

## V - Recreative, Sports, Games, Festivals
- [V – Recreative, Sports, Games, Festivals – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/v-recreative-sports-games-festivals/)  Human Readable

## W - Fine Arts
- [W – Fine Arts – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/w-fine-arts/)  Human Readable

## English Language
- [X – English – Whitespace](https://purl.org/whitespace/x-english/)  Human Readable

## Liturature
